name: > Continue
description:
(THE RED AND GREEN ARROWS ARE FOR VOTING!)

This Ludum Dare 30 game by ratking is just a simple Choose-Your-Own-Adventure. But you can add your own path to it!

  • R = restart
  • M = mute the music
  • Green Arrow = Up-vote last answer
  • Red Arrow = Down-vote last answer
  • Want a Linux version? Look below.
